Community.Foundation.ItemLens 1.0
No extra steps required. Just install and enjoy. Tool will be available at /sitecore/lens.aspx By default the tool requires Sitecore developer role (or admin) to access.
Review the config file: \App_Config\Include\Foundation\Foundation.ItemLens.config
=============================================== This package installs the following files: ===============================================
\App_Config\Include\Foundation\Foundation.ItemLens.config \sitecore\lens.aspx \bin\Community.Foundation.ItemLens.dll \bin\Community.Foundation.ItemLens.pdb
=============================================== This package installs no data items: ===============================================
NOTES: If you prefer moving lens.aspx into \sitecore\admin folder be aware that resolving item by relative or absolute URL will not work as the admin folder has its own Sitecore site context.
